shadcn.import: import { Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselNext, CarouselPrevious } from '@/components/ui/carousel'

notes: shadcn Carousel wraps Embla Carousel; vlting is a custom implementation
vlting adds built-in autoplay with autoplayInterval prop (default 5000ms)
vlting adds Carousel.Dots sub-component for dot indicator navigation
vlting respects prefers-reduced-motion (disables autoplay and transitions)
Keyboard navigation: ArrowLeft/Right for horizontal, ArrowUp/Down for vertical
Default orientation is 'horizontal'; loop defaults to false
Sets role='region', aria-roledescription='carousel' on root; aria-roledescription='slide' on items

breaking.vlting: Custom API; not all Embla options available
